conversations.body_text: Hi Ian Meru,    Delivery is expected on the 20th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01300131548

Good day,

Just saw the email update. Thank you very much!

Warmest regards,

*Immanuel Anthony E. Meru*

*iameru@mra.com.ph <iameru@mra.com.ph>*
